template <typename T, typename PreferredT, typename ActualT>
struct vsip::impl::Adjust_complex_type
File: ../../../vsip/core/adjust_layout.hpp

Variant of Adjust_type for adjusting complex_type's.

Uses the value type T to determine when the complex_type matters. In particular, for non-complex value types, the complex_type is not applicable.

Specializations:
